snippet: The Red Bulls star Thierry Henry will miss the team’s regular-season finale after receiving a red card in a loss to Sporting Kansas City.
lead_paragraph: The Red Bulls star Thierry Henry will miss the team’s regular-season finale after receiving a red card in a loss to Sporting Kansas City.

headline.main: Loss Leaves Red Bulls a Must-Win Game
headline.print_headline: Red Bulls Are Left With Must-Win Game; Red Card Means Henry Will Miss It
headline.seo: Loss Leaves Red Bulls a Must-Win Game
headline.content_kicker: Roundup | Sporting Kansas City 2, Red Bulls 0
